src_text: IKhabhinethi likhuthazekile ngenxa yoMbiko Womhlaba Jikelele we-UNAIDS wakamuva, osanda kwethulwa eNingizimu Afrik Ngokwalo mbiko, iNingizimu Afrika iphumelele ukusinciphisa isibalo sabantu abatheleleka yigciwane lesandulela ngculazi (i-HIV) ngabantu abangaphezu kwama-40% saze esabantu ababulawa yizifo ezihambisana nengculazi (i-AIDS) naso sancipha ngama-40% kusukela ngowezi-2010.
trg_text: Joint United Nations Programme on HIV and AIDS (UNAIDS) Global Report Cabinet is encouraged by the latest UNAIDS Global Report, which was recently launched in South Afric According to the report, South Africa has successfully reduced new HIV infections by more than 40% and AIDS-related deaths by around 40% since 2010.

trg_text: The Policy and Policy Direction sets a framework for the transformation of the sector by enabling entrance of new players in this important market while at the same time encouraging investments and innovatio The Minister of Communications and Digital Technologies, Ms Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, will in the next few days issue the Cabinet approved final policy and brief the media Presidential Expert Advisory Panel on Land Reform and Agriculture Report Cabinet received the final report from the Presidential Expert Advisory Panel on Land Reform and Agricultur President Ramaphosa appointed the panel in September 2018 to provide a unified policy perspective on land reform The report makes findings on the current status quo and makes recommendations that will assist in accelerating the work of government in redressing the historical land distribution imbalance Cabinet directed that all Ministers, through their respective departments, must study the report and its proposed recommendations and revert to Cabinet within two month The Inter-Ministerial Committee on Land Reform chaired by Deputy President David Mabuza will oversee this proces Cabinet extends its gratitude for the work done by the panel chaired by Dr Vuyokazi Mahlati and approved that the report be made accessible to the publi

src_text: iqembu lezwe lomdlalo webhola lomnqakiswano, ama-Proteas, ngomsebenzi oncomekayo eliwenzile nangokundizisela igama nefulegi laseNingizimu Afika phezulu ngokufinyelela kumdlalo owandulela owamanqamu kuNdebe Yomhlaba eLiverpoo Ukukhuphuka kwalo lisuka esikhundleni sesihlanu liya kwesesine ohlwini lwamazwe omhlaba kunconywa kakhul Phezu kwalokho, lihalalisela uNks Karla Pretorius ngokukhethwa nokuba wuMdlali Ophume Phambili Novelele eNdebeni Yomhlaba yowezi-2012.
trg_text: Ms Mphokolo Makara;(b)

src_text: abadlali baseNingizimu Afrika ngokwenza umsebenzi omangalisayo emncintiswaneni we-Diamond League ye-International Association of Athletics Federation (i-IAAF) obubanjelwe eLondo Umnikazi werekhodi laseNingizimu Afrika u-Akani Simbine ubesesimweni esihle kakhulu emjahweni wamadoda we-100m, ngenkathi enqoba ngesikhathi esiphume phambili emqhudelwaneni ngo- Emdlalweni wokugxuma amabanga amade, uLuvo Manyonga unqobe emdlalweni wokugxuma amabanga amade wamadoda ngebanga eliphume phambili emqhudelwaneni elingu-8,37m, kube uzakwabo uRuswahl Samaai ugxume wathola indawo yesithathu engubude obungu-
trg_text: Ms Delicate Mabuza;(d)

src_text: iNdlovu Youth Choir, omculo wayo ophuma phambili obadlulisele emzuliswaneni olandelayo we-America's Got Talent edlala bukhoma kuthelevishin
trg_text: Mr Maurice Radebe; and(g)
